Sentencas: Silicate glasses based on SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 (SBBW) are synthesized with varying added Al2O3 content, and their thermal and structural properties are examined as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells (RSOCs).
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When up to 17.5 mol%, Al2O3 is added, glass stability is improved at the expense of viscosity at sealing temperature.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass transition temperature (T-g), coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) and flow at sealing temperature are investigated while varying Al2O3 content, to find the proper composition for RSOC sealing.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structural changes in the glasses resulting from the Al2O3 are inspected using Raman spectroscopy and an X-ray diffractometer.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The adhesion characteristics of the glasses are examined by applying the glasses between NiO-yittria stabilized zirconia (NiO-YSZ) and Crofer22APU.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A RSOC stack with 15 cells is prepared with glass containing 10 mol% of Al2O3 as a sealing material, and the practical feasibility of the glass is successfully demonstrated.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage is monitored while cycling the RSOC stack between water electrolysis mode and fuel cell mode.
Titulo: SiO2-B2O3-BaO-WO3 glasses with varying Al2O3 content as a sealing material for reversible solid oxide fuel cells
